column7: Charon 13 was a desolate rimworld asteroid in a forgotten system and the site of both Xenomorph and Yautja activity.[1] PS-3 was a geo-thermal processing station built to siphon energy from the planet's core, more than five miles straight down. It was destroyed when, weakened by combat, the bracing struts crumbled and the entire station fell into the magma.[1]

After the destruction of the first station in the Neroïd Sector in 2179, a second Anchorpoint Station was built around 2180 in the system as a refueling station and transit hub to the Far Reach of the American Arm.[1][2]

New Galveston,[1] formal designation LV-178,[2] was a planet with 88% of Earth's gravity that was first explored and mined for the mineral trimonite. The mines were eventually closed and the planet abandoned, but many years later it was terraformed and colonized, being formally named New Galveston. There were numerous small settlements, but only three major settlements were connected by train tubes. The Sea of Sorrows" was an old toxic mining area where miners found a trimonite vein and Xenomorphs. The Sea of Sorrows was where the mercenaries employed by the Weyland-Yutani Corporation began looking for Xenomorph specimens to capture

The system is composed of two stars, a white subgiant named Alpha Fornacis A and a blue straggler named Alpha Fornacis B located at a distance of about 46.03 light-years (14.11 parsecs) Trailward from the Sol System. The system is dominated by a debris disc made up of millions of mineral-rich (tungsten and timonite among others) asteroids and planetoids.[1] Novgorod Station is located in the system orbiting Alpha Fornacis A and several mining outposts are scattered around the system.[1]
system was the destination of the USCSS Cronus expedition in 2110 when Weyland-Yutani searched to acquired and experiment the Engineer Chemical A0-3959X.91 – 15. They landed on LV-1113
